alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 5:36AM AKST until January 15 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO MIDNIGHT AKST FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches, with the highest amounts near the border. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Mainly the Haines Highway northwest of Haines and the South Klondike Highway north of Skagway. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to midnight AKST Friday night. Snow develops late this afternoon for the region and intensifies in the evening before easing late tonight. More snow develops in the region late Friday morning and persists through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Roads could become slippery. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Little accumulation is expected near sea level Thursday afternoon, and precipitation should change to rain Thursday night, but cooler temperatures could result in accumulating snow Friday into Friday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Lynn Canal; Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway
